polarityjam.controller.collector module

class polarityjam.controller.collector.PropertyCollector

Bases: object

Collects features “as they come” in a large dataset. Not responsible for feature calculation!

extract(img, cells_mask, filename, output_path, collection)

Extracts the features from an input image.

get_image_for_segmentation(img)

Returns segmentation (junction, nucleus) if multichannel, else junction only.

Gets the image of the junction channel specified in the self.params.

Gets the image of the marker channel specified in the self.params.

Gets the image of the nucleus channel specified in the self.params.

get_image_organelle(img)

Gets the image of the organelle channel specified in the self.params.

threshold(single_cell_mask, single_nucleus_mask=None, single_organelle_mask=None)

Thresholds given single_cell_mask. Returns True if falls under threshold.
